about_the_game:
Discover the story of a family driven to madness by an unknown force. From the suffocating basement to a bathroom stained with secrets, every room unveils a piece of the deadly puzzle that haunted the Maple Street house, where traces of violence and disturbing memories linger through time.

The House: A Maple Street Story is a first-person horror experience that takes you into a cursed house where nothing is as it seems. Dive into the grim fate of a family and the mysteries hidden in every corner, all while being stalked by a malevolent presence that never fully reveals itself.

TENSE ATMOSPHERE AND REALISM

With haunting visuals and sounds that seem to emerge from the very walls, The House delivers an intense psychological horror immersion, with no combat or traditional actions – here, fear is silent and relentless.

KEY FEATURES

  • Dark and Realistic Atmosphere: Every detail is designed to evoke discomfort and vulnerability, from the piled-up trash to the murky water in the bathtub.

  • Non-Linear Narrative: Collect clues like letters, radio recordings, and disturbing visions that reveal the house's dark past.

  • Unique Interactivity: Interact with key elements as the house appears to respond and transform with your presence.

  • Challenging and Enigmatic Puzzles: Solve puzzles that uncover secrets, requiring you to interpret messages left by the entity or family members.

Do you have the courage to face the horrors hidden on Maple Street?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 4gen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon™ RX 460
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Explore a cursed house where a family was driven to madness by a dark presence. In The House: A Maple Street Story, uncover a terrifying mystery through enigmatic puzzles, an engaging narrative, and a psychological horror atmosphere that holds your every move captive.
